languages.text: "Потому что там будет Пощада". {n}Джай мрачнеет.{/n} "Споры и конфликты внутри Миссии разрешает он. И я не хочу сталкиваться с ним один на один".
"Because Mercy will be there." {n}Jae's face darkens.{/n} "He settles all disputes and conflicts in the Mission. I don't want to go up against him on my own."
languages.original_text: "Потому что там будет Пощада". {n}Джай мрачнеет.{/n} "Споры и конфликты внутри Миссии разрешает он. И я не хочу сталкиваться с ним один на один".

traits.locale_text: "Because Mercy will be there." {n}Jae's face darkens.{/n} "He settles all disputes and conflicts in the Mission. I don't want to go up against him on my own."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Because Mercy will be there." {n}Jae's face darkens.{/n} "He settles all disputes and conflicts in the Mission. I don't want to go up against him on my own."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Because Mercy will be there." {n}Jae's face darkens.{/n} "He settles all disputes and conflicts in the Mission. I don't want to go up against him on my own."

traits.locale_text: "Because Mercy will be there." {n}Jae's face darkens.{/n} "He settles all disputes and conflicts in the Mission. I don't want to go up against him on my own."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “因为悯慈也会在场。”{n}婕伊的脸色阴沉下来。{/n}“他负责解决组织内部所有的争端与冲突，我可不想独自面对他。”
languages.original_text: "Because Mercy will be there." {n}Jae's face darkens.{/n} "He settles all disputes and conflicts in the Mission. I don't want to go up against him on my own."

traits.locale_text: “因为悯慈也会在场。”{n}婕伊的脸色阴沉下来。{/n}“他负责解决组织内部所有的争端与冲突，我可不想独自面对他。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「マーシーがそこにいるから」{n}ジェイの表情が暗くなる。{/n}「彼は聖務団のすべての紛争や対立を解決しているほどの人なんだ。あたし一人で彼に立ち向かいたくないよ」
languages.original_text: "Because Mercy will be there." {n}Jae's face darkens.{/n} "He settles all disputes and conflicts in the Mission. I don't want to go up against him on my own."

traits.locale_text: 「マーシーがそこにいるから」{n}ジェイの表情が暗くなる。{/n}「彼は聖務団のすべての紛争や対立を解決しているほどの人なんだ。あたし一人で彼に立ち向かいたくないよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Porque Mercy estará presente». {n}El rostro de Jae se oscurece.{/n} «Es quien resuelve toda clase de disputas en la misión. Y no quiero enfrentarme sola a él».
languages.original_text: "Because Mercy will be there." {n}Jae's face darkens.{/n} "He settles all disputes and conflicts in the Mission. I don't want to go up against him on my own."

traits.locale_text: «Porque Mercy estará presente». {n}El rostro de Jae se oscurece.{/n} «Es quien resuelve toda clase de disputas en la misión. Y no quiero enfrentarme sola a él».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Jae s'assombrit.{/n} « Parce que Mercy sera là. C'est lui qui règle tous les litiges et les conflits de la Mission, et je ne veux pas me retrouver seule face à lui. »
languages.original_text: "Because Mercy will be there." {n}Jae's face darkens.{/n} "He settles all disputes and conflicts in the Mission. I don't want to go up against him on my own."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Jae s'assombrit.{/n} « Parce que Mercy sera là. C'est lui qui règle tous les litiges et les conflits de la Mission, et je ne veux pas me retrouver seule face à lui. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Weil auch Mercy anwesend sein wird." {n}Jaes Gesicht verfinstert sich.{/n} "Er ist derjenige, der alle Streitigkeiten und Konflikte innerhalb der Mission regelt. Ich will ihm nicht alleine gegenübertreten."
languages.original_text: "Because Mercy will be there." {n}Jae's face darkens.{/n} "He settles all disputes and conflicts in the Mission. I don't want to go up against him on my own."

traits.locale_text: "Weil auch Mercy anwesend sein wird." {n}Jaes Gesicht verfinstert sich.{/n} "Er ist derjenige, der alle Streitigkeiten und Konflikte innerhalb der Mission regelt. Ich will ihm nicht alleine gegenübertreten."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Çünkü Merhamet orada olacak." {n}Jae'ın yüzü kararıyor.{/n} "Misyon'daki tüm anlaşmazlıkları ve çatışmaları karara bağlayan odur. Karşısına tek başıma çıkmak istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Because Mercy will be there." {n}Jae's face darkens.{/n} "He settles all disputes and conflicts in the Mission. I don't want to go up against him on my own."

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü Merhamet orada olacak." {n}Jae'ın yüzü kararıyor.{/n} "Misyon'daki tüm anlaşmazlıkları ve çatışmaları o karara bağlar. Onun karşısına kendi başıma çıkmak istemiyorum."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
